result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 6, 2022 at 09:15 am.

(9:58 AM cases 22CF612, 22CF671 called.) Defendant William O. McCann in court. Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for William O. McCann. Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin.
State in compliance with victim notification requirements. 
Defendant waives reading of Information in cases 22CF612, 22CF671 and enters Not Guilty pleas to all counts in both cases, which the Court receives.
Court orders 20 days for filing of motions which may be extended for good cause.
Attorney Hillestad advises is hoping to come to a global resolution and requests a status conference about 6-8 weeks out.
Court orders defendant to be finger printed in case 22CF612 today before leaving the courthouse.
Status Conference on cases 22CF612, 22CF671 scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 9:15 am in person.

9:53 AM cases 22CF612, 22CF671 called. Defendant William O. McCann in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for William O. McCann.  Prosecuting attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
In both files: Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. Cases are referred to Branch 2 to schedule ARGN.

10:17 AM Cases called: 22CF612 & 22CF671. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant William O. McCann in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for William O. McCann.
Hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.
